welcome_message_body: "Welcome to Thompson, Canada! This beautiful northern city is known for its breathtaking landscapes, friendly locals, and rich cultural heritage. Take some time to explore and immerse yourself in all the charm Thompson has to offer."

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Thompson Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Regional Terminal
terminals.description: The regional terminal at Thompson Airport serves flights to and from nearby communities.

wifi.note: Free WiFi is available throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Pikwitonei Airport serves all domestic and international flights.

terminals.name: Cargo Terminal
terminals.description: The cargo terminal at Pikwitonei Airport handles all freight and cargo operations.

wifi.note: Passengers can access free WiFi throughout the airport.

terminals.name: Main Terminal
terminals.description: The main terminal at Thicket Portage Airport is a small building with basic amenities for travelers.

terminals.name: General Aviation Terminal
terminals.description: The general aviation terminal at Thicket Portage Airport is used for private and charter flights.

wifi.note: WiFi is available for free throughout the airport.
